title: Jack Thriller in the trap! with Karlous Miller and Clayton English
itunes:title: Jack Thriller in the trap! with Karlous Miller and Clayton English
description:
Hilarious stand up comedian and entertainer Jack Thriller blesses the trap with stories from his run with ThisIs50.com up in New York City! Jack tells the story of how he and his uncle manifested working with 50 Cent. Plus, Jack Thriller tells the story of how he got his foot in the comedy game and explains it all started with seeing the Kings of Comedy Live. Jack Thriller has been creating his programming and shares some tips on how to stay relevant in the internet age. Karlous and Clayton keep the jokes flying non stop! This is the coldest podcast!




Hit Our Website for more info: https://www.85southshow.com/​

Get our custom merchandise: https://85apparelco.com/​

Subscribe To our Channel: bitly.com/85tube

WATCH KARLOUS' MILLER's COMEDY SPECIAL! https://vimeo.com/ondemand/karlousmil...​

Director - JOE T. NEWMAN - www.ayoungplayer.com

Producer - LANCE CRAYTON - https://www.instagram.com/cat_corleone_​

It's Jon - https://www.instagram.com/holaj_o_n/
